fields.text: Welcome to Getaround San Francisco, where you can rent cars from people nearby starting at five dollars an hour.
To rent a car and explore available vehicles, press '[INDEX]'.
To search cars by location, press '[INDEX]'.
Connecting you to our vehicle availability team, please hold.
To manage or cancel an existing reservation, press '[INDEX]'.
Connecting you to reservations support, please hold.
To list your car and earn income as a host, press '[INDEX]'.
To sign up as a car owner, press '[INDEX]'.
One moment please, we will connect you with our host onboarding team.
To manage your current listings, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we transfer you to your host account manager.
